Item Description The LTD 400 Series is designed with the professional performing and recording musician in mind, but is available at a price that even casual players can afford. The intense offset double-cutaway shape of the Viper is now available with a great-looking mahogany top in Natural Satin finish, and we’ve included a pair of high-quality Seymour Duncan pickups. Excellent for all music styles and genres, it offers set-neck construction for smooth access to the highest frets, and a TOM bridge and tailpiece.
